<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantrangelist/#a061e91d5567bc9bafb0c39edf6e92532">getBitWidth</a>() == CRL.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantrangelist/#a061e91d5567bc9bafb0c39edf6e92532">getBitWidth</a>() &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> i = 0, j = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// &quot;PreviousRange&quot; tracks the lowest unioned range that is being processed.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Its lower is fixed and the upper may be updated over iterations.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantrange">ConstantRange</a> PreviousRange(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantrangelist/#a061e91d5567bc9bafb0c39edf6e92532">getBitWidth</a>(), </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Ranges&#91;i&#93;.getLower().slt(CRL.Ranges&#91;j&#93;.getLower())) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><Highlight kind="normal">    PreviousRange = Ranges&#91;i++&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><Highlight kind="normal">    PreviousRange = CRL.Ranges&#91;j++&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Try to union &quot;PreviousRange&quot; and &quot;CR&quot;. If they are disjoint, push</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// &quot;PreviousRange&quot; to the result and assign it to &quot;CR&quot;, a new union range.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Otherwise, update the upper of &quot;PreviousRange&quot; to cover &quot;CR&quot;. Note that,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the lower of &quot;PreviousRange&quot; is always less or equal the lower of &quot;CR&quot;.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> UnionAndUpdateRange = &#91;&amp;PreviousRange,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><Highlight kind="normal">                              &amp;Result&#93;(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantrange">ConstantRange</a> &amp;CR) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (PreviousRange.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantrange/#aa1955c426e1ff66455b4bb6657ee995d">getUpper</a>().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#adafa9575780f9246d1df0b7e2a619356">slt</a>(CR.getLower())) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><Highlight kind="normal">      Result.Ranges.push&#95;back(PreviousRange);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><Highlight kind="normal">      PreviousRange = CR;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><Highlight kind="normal">      PreviousRange = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantrange">ConstantRange</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><Highlight kind="normal">          PreviousRange.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantrange/#a23f4339e49343721146062b10c144052">getLower</a>(),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><Highlight kind="normal">          <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/apintops/#a6d2ea807ef8eb6d40335d6f11edf942c">APIntOps::smax</a>(PreviousRange.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantrange/#aa1955c426e1ff66455b4bb6657ee995d">getUpper</a>(), CR.getUpper()));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (i &lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantrangelist/#ab7bb6ba03311ea7bb96234d8e366c385">size</a>() || j &lt; CRL.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantrangelist/#ab7bb6ba03311ea7bb96234d8e366c385">size</a>()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (j == CRL.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantrangelist/#ab7bb6ba03311ea7bb96234d8e366c385">size</a>() ||</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><Highlight kind="normal">        (i &lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantrangelist/#ab7bb6ba03311ea7bb96234d8e366c385">size</a>() &amp;&amp; Ranges&#91;i&#93;.getLower().slt(CRL.Ranges&#91;j&#93;.getLower()))) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Merge PreviousRange with this.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Result;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantrangelist/#a061e91d5567bc9bafb0c39edf6e92532">getBitWidth</a>() == CRL.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantrangelist/#a061e91d5567bc9bafb0c39edf6e92532">getBitWidth</a>() &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantrangelist/#aad1226cc33da9186b9bb703fb6e6db55">ConstantRangeList</a> Result;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> i = 0, j = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (i &lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantrangelist/#ab7bb6ba03311ea7bb96234d8e366c385">size</a>() &amp;&amp; j &lt; CRL.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantrangelist/#ab7bb6ba03311ea7bb96234d8e366c385">size</a>()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#a34bd74317e3f04bfc4318c2d1a470877">Range</a> = this-&gt;Ranges&#91;i&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;OtherRange = CRL.Ranges&#91;j&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The intersection of two Ranges is (max(lowers), min(uppers)), and it&#39;s</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// possible that max(lowers) &gt; min(uppers) if they don&#39;t have intersection.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Add the intersection to result only if it&#39;s non-empty.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// To keep simple, we don&#39;t call ConstantRange::intersectWith() as it</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// considers the complex upper wrapped case and may result two ranges,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// like (2, 8) &amp;&amp; (6, 4) = &#123;(2, 4), (6, 8)&#125;.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> Start = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/apintops/#a6d2ea807ef8eb6d40335d6f11edf942c">APIntOps::smax</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#a34bd74317e3f04bfc4318c2d1a470877">Range</a>.getLower(), OtherRange.getLower());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> End = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/apintops/#a688eca8fbe6295f4b002f1e705d3e916">APIntOps::smin</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#a34bd74317e3f04bfc4318c2d1a470877">Range</a>.getUpper(), OtherRange.getUpper());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Start.slt(End))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><Highlight kind="normal">      Result.Ranges.push&#95;back(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantrange">ConstantRange</a>(Start, End));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Move to the next Range in one list determined by the uppers.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For example: A = &#123;(0, 2), (4, 8)&#125;; B = &#123;(-2, 5), (6, 10)&#125;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We need to intersect three pairs: A0 &amp;&amp; B0; A1 &amp;&amp; B0; A1 &amp;&amp; B1.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#a34bd74317e3f04bfc4318c2d1a470877">Range</a>.getUpper().slt(OtherRange.getUpper()))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"><Highlight kind="normal">      i++;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><Highlight kind="normal">      j++;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Result;</Highlight></CodeLine>
